channel.title: EASY autotalker
channel.description: can someone make me a simple ewasy auto tlkaer without srl? no randoms, and make it stop when I press f8 please. ty.

item.title: EASY autotalker
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

okk

dont get simpeler than this

{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][] []] run it and to stop it [[] []] press F2 [[] []] By: Nueb35 [[] [][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]} program New; const say = 'What u want it to say!'; begin repeat sendkeys(say+chr(13)) wait(1000) until isFkeydown(2); end.

item.title: EASY autotalker
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[code]{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
[]] Put any extras in the text box. [[]
[]] exaple: flash2:scroll:wow! [[]
[]] [[]
[]] [[]
[]] DO NOT MESS WITH ANYTHING UNDER THIS [[]
[]] [[]
[]] []] [] [] [] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [] [] [] [] [][][] [][][] [][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [] [][] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [] [[]
[]] [] [[] [][][] [][][][] [][][] [][][][] [][][][] [[]
[]] [[]
[]] By: Nueb35 [[]
[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]}

program New;
var
num1:Tform;
lab1:Tlabel;
lab2:Tlabel;
but1:Tbutton;
edt1:Tedit;
V:TVariantArray;
start:boolean;
procedure talk;
begin
activateclient;
if(edt1.text = ‘’)then
begin
exit;
end else
if(not(edt1.text = ‘’))then
begin
start:=true;
wait(4000)
repeat
sendkeys(edt1.TEXT + chr(13))
wait(1000)
until isFkeydown(2);
end;
end;
procedure but1c(sender:Tobject);
begin
num1.ModalResult := 1;
start:=true;
end;
procedure N1;
begin
num1 := CreateForm;
num1.Left := 250;
num1.Top := 114;
num1.Width := 283;
num1.Height := 170;
num1.Caption := ‘Simple autotalker’;
num1.Color := clYellow;
num1.Font.Color := clblack;
num1.Font.Height := -11;
num1.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
num1.Font.Style := [fsBold];
num1.Visible := False;
num1.PixelsPerInch := 100;
lab1 := TLabel.Create(num1);
lab1.Parent := num1;
lab1.Left := 4;
lab1.Top := 28;
lab1.Width := 77;
lab1.Height := 13;
lab1.caption:=‘What to say :’;
lab2 := TLabel.Create(num1);
lab2.Parent := num1;
lab2.Left := 89;
lab2.Top := 90;
lab2.Width := 99;
lab2.Height := 13;
lab2.Caption:= ‘Press F2 to stop’;
edt1 := TEdit.Create(num1);
edt1.Parent := num1;
edt1.Left :=84;
edt1.Top := 23;
edt1.Width := 153;
edt1.Height := 21;
but1 := TButton.Create(num1);
but1.OnClick := @But1c;
but1.Parent := num1;
but1.Left := 97;
but1.Top := 56;
but1.Width := 75;
but1.Height := 25;
but1.Caption := ‘Begin’;
but1.TabOrder := 1;
end;
procedure N2;
begin
num1.ShowModal;
end;
procedure prog;
begin
if(start=true)then
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] Thanx for yousing Nuebs simple aoutotalker. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] If you get baned its not my fault [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end else
begin
cleardebug;
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
writeln(’[]] You did not put anything to say or closed the form. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Please re-run the script and try again. [[]’);
writeln(’[]] [[]’);
writeln(’[]] www.Run3H4x.net [[]’);
writeln(’[]] Let the ownage begin. [[]’);
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]’);
end;
end;
procedure N3;
begin
SetArrayLength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘N1’, v);
ThreadSafeCall(‘N2’, v);
end;
begin
N3
talk;
prog;
freeform(num1);
end.[/code]
